name: df-tendo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ctendo, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cab(s2, w3a(wf(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wral(s3, cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s4, cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), ccom(cv(s3), cv(s4))), ccom(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)))))), wral(s3, cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cfv(cfv(ctrl, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cfv(ctrl, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s3)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ TEndo =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶ { s2 |((s2 :((LTrn ` s0)` s1)‚Üí((LTrn ` s0)` s1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1),(s2 `(s3 ‚àò s4))=((s2 ` s3)‚àò(s2 ` s4))))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1),(((trL ` s0)` s1)`(s2 ` s3))[(le ` s0)](((trL ` s0)` s1)` s3)))}))
comment: Define trace-preserving endomorphisms on the set of translations. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jun-2013.)
